name: Extreme Bus Driving Parking
description:
Welcome to a new era of coach bus simulator. In game your goal is to drive the bus and give service to pick and drop the passengers one place to another for becoming a true coach bus simulator. There are many stations in this game. So lets enjoy the craziest nonstop experience of coach bus simulator.

FEATURES
- Realistic physics of steering wheel and smooth control
- Multiple Camera Angles
- High Definition Graphics
- Realistic environment of the city
